product_name: Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Baja Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A classic travel shirt for hot climes, the men's Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Baja Long-Sleeve Shirt features an open weave that vents and secure pockets for gear. Open-weave 100% cotton fabric is naturally soft and breathable to keep you comfortable. Sleeves can be rolled up and secured with button tabs. Cargo-style chest pockets are secured with button flaps. Royal Robbins men's Cool Mesh Baja Long-Sleeve Shirt features a curved shirttail hem. Closeout.
short_description: A classic travel shirt for hot climes, the men's Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Baja Long-Sleeve Shirt features an open weave that vents and secure pockets for gear.
